name: Stickerboy
description:
Stickerboy is a tribute to the 1985 Paperboy game by Atari.

In Stickerboy, your goal will be to stick as many posters as you can in the opened shops. But be aware! the traffic and obstacles can make you fall from your skateboard.

Instructions

Move with the up and down arrow keys. Use space bar to stick a poster.

Credits

Programming: Facundo Balboa

Art: Kevin Miles

Music: Patricio Maffud

This game is sponsored by Öffnungszeitenbuch.
